title: Some storage for Images seems inaccessible, cannot get access to it ever
content:
On my Pixel phone, when I click Settings, and then click Storage, it lists the storage of my phone for each categories. In Photos & videos, the storage is 5.3 GB, and in Files the storage is 5.2 GB. 
But when I click Photo & videos, it further lists the following items,
Photos  177 MB
Camera 112.70 MB
Images 5.09 GB

I cannot get access to those 5 GB Images to free up those storage.

I also doubt the storage of 5.2 GB in Files is weird. I cannot free it up either.

I have tried everything with Google online support by sharing my screen. They asked me to delete all backed-up photos in Photo app, install all new updates and restart the phone. But still there is 5GB space hanging there.
